channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A 20-year-old cancer vaccine may hold the key to long-term survival
item.description: Two decades after a breast cancer vaccine trial, every participant is still alive—an astonishing result for metastatic disease. Scientists found their...

item.title: A fish that ages in months reveals how kidneys grow old
item.description: A fast-aging fish is giving scientists a rare, accelerated look at how kidneys grow old—and how a common drug may slow that process down. Researchers ...

item.title: Gray wolves are hunting sea otters and no one knows how
item.description: On a remote Alaskan island, gray wolves are rewriting the rulebook by hunting sea otters — a behavior few scientists ever expected to see. Researchers...

item.title: Tiny mammals are sending warning signs scientists can finally read

item.title: A breakthrough that turns exhaust CO2 into useful materials
